attributes.action: Prevent USA President Barack Obama from speaking in support of the EU.
attributes.background:
Obama intends to drum up support for UK staying in EU.
The internal affairs of this United Kingdom has nothing what so ever to do with the US. Likewise the internal affairs of the USA have nothing to do with our government or people.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the content of speeches made by the President of the USA.
